<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106337</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106337</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207045</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Heritage: Civilization and the Jews</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erbe: Zivilisation und die Juden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Héritage : Civilisation et les juifs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Heritage: Civilização e os jews</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Eredità: Civilizzazione e gli ebrei</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κληρονομιά: Πολιτισμός και οι Εβραίοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Herencia: Civilización y los judíos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is the website for the PBS series by the same name. The website provides a description and lesson for each of the nine episodes, an historical time line, and more.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist die Web site für die PBS Serie durch den 
gleichen Namen. Die Web site stellt eine Beschreibung und eine 
Lektion für jedes der neun Episoden, der historischen Zeitzeile und 
mehr zur Verfügung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est le site Web pour la série de PBS par le même
nom. Le site Web fournit une description et une leçon pour 
chacune des neuf épisodes, d'une ligne historique de temps, et de 
plus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é o Web site para a série de PBS pelo mesmo 
nome. O Web site fornece uma descrição e uma lição para cada
uma dos nove episodes, de uma linha histórica do tempo, e de mais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è il Web site per la serie di PBS dallo stesso 
nome. Il Web site fornisce una descrizione e una lezione per 
ciascuno dei nove episodi, di una riga storica di tempo e di più.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι ο ιστοχώρος για τη σειρά PBS από το ίδιο 
όνομα. Ο ιστοχώρος παρέχει μια περιγραφή και ένα μάθημα 
για κάθε ένα από τα εννέα επεισόδια, μια ιστορική χρονική 
γραμμή, και περισσότερους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">está el Web site para la serie de PBS por el 
mismo nombre. El Web site proporciona a una descripción y a una
lección para cada uno de los nueve episodios, de una línea 
histórica del tiempo, y más.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207045</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106337</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/heritage-civilization-and-the-jews</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
